translation.Name: Easter Note - News #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Recently a freight ship was spotted off the coast west coast of Rapa Nui. What's unusual about this occurrence is that the ship was covered in rust as if it had been there for years, however, there were no reports of this ship showing up, it's almost like it didn't exist before today.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: Catch us next week when we talk about Pam's recently mowed lawn.
